item.title: K. C++ SOLID Video Series
item.description: Providing simple, yet comprehensive examples of Bob Martin’s SOLID principles, using C++. Video series linked below!

item.title: S. Calculate My Outs (Texas Hold'em)
item.description: An ‘out’ is a card that you have yet to see and can improve your hand in Texas Hold’em. This app shuffles a deck, gives every player at the table a hand of 2 cards, deals a flop, and then uses the cards in the flop and your hand to determine which cards are necessary to increase the value of your hand. Note: I wrote this program while quarantined in my dorm at University.
